text: Hey, can I load components from other libraries as an island or do I need to always make a wrapper component for them? I think it currently needs default export to work right? Could that be changed, that you can always use named or default exports?
Currently in order to use a 3rd party lib ... or any other component ... in or as an island, you do need to use our `Island` component.

> I think it currently needs default export to work right?
Can you clarify here ... what needs default export?
my guess is the question is around the module being loaded with `?island` , which yes is expecting the default export currently
